room_title: Escape room "Escape The Pharaoh's Tomb" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
room_description: You and your team of archeologists are hunting for hidden treasure in the great pyramid of the Pharaoh Khufu. Your luck has run out and now you find yourself trapped deep inside his cursed tomb. With only one hour before you run out of oxygen, you must solve the riddles and mysteries of the tomb, and make your way out alive!
